name: No Justice
description:
It will been a 2D platformer with elements stealth-action. For now, it's a very primitive concept. After jam our team will continue development.

WASD - movement
E - Invisible
Left Mouse Button - Shot 
Go to the box on the ground and press R to hide in the box( Easter Egg to MGS 5, lol)

Attention, it's just a concept. For exit, play in Windowed mode and press cross.
